InPageEdit Analytics is the companion an: InPageEdit Analytics is the companion analytics platform for the InPageEdit NEXT project. By collecting and displaying usage data from around the world, it helps developers and the community better understand how the tool is used, optimize feature design, and enhance user experience.
NO sensitive data will be collected.
